name: Super Mario Bros. S
description:
CONTROLS: Computer

 WASD or arrow keys to move K or X to sprint/attack (or turn on autosprint)

 P or C for special attack L, Z, Up, or W to jump P or C to dismount Yoshi W or up to enter doors Space for Pause / START Mobile 

 Use the joystick to move and jump Run/attack by moving it further Drag off of the edge of the screen for Pause / START World Map 

 WASD or arrow keys to move Space / START to enter a level
